data.approach: Add Pi coding agent as a new agent harness in SQUAD. This involves: 1) Add Pi preset to AGENT_PRESETS in agentProgram.ts, 2) Add Pi ready patterns to shellPatterns.ts, 3) Add Pi provider logo to providerLogos.ts, 4) Add Pi command building logic to spawn API. Pi uses npm package @mariozechner/pi-coding-agent, supports multi-provider models, uses subscription auth, and accepts prompts as positional arguments.

summary: Added Pi preset to AGENT_PRESETS with multi-provider model support
Added Pi ready patterns to shellPatterns.ts for session startup detection
Added Pi provider logo (Greek letter Ï€) to providerLogos.ts with purple branding
Added Pi command handling to spawn API for model flag passing
Build compiles successfully with all changes
Removed and simplified ingest-related routes and server configurations
Cleaned up files in the ingest tools directory
Reduced significant code complexity in routing and configuration

suggestedTasks.title: Add Test Coverage for Ingest Configuration Reduction
suggestedTasks.description: Create comprehensive unit and integration tests for the simplified ingest configuration and routing. Verify that all previous functionality is maintained and validate the new streamlined approach. Focus on testing edge cases and ensuring robust error handling.
suggestedTasks.reason: Code complexity was reduced, requiring validation of remaining functionality

suggestedTasks.title: Document Ingest Configuration Simplification
suggestedTasks.description: Update developer documentation to reflect the recent changes in ingest routing and configuration. Create clear guidelines on the new simplified approach, explaining the rationale for code reduction and how developers should interact with the new configuration structure.
suggestedTasks.reason: Recent code changes require updated documentation for team understanding

patterns: Reduced number of server-side configuration files
gotchas: Ensure no existing functionality was inadvertently removed during simplification

documentationNeeds: Revise developer onboarding documentation for routing
